init-param.description: Full path to directory of ARC files. Be aware that changing this value in the web.xml of an arcretriever sitting under a containers webapp directory can prove frustrating. The container usually notices your change then re-undoes the original WAR file overwriting your edits. If you remove the WAR file version, the container will subsequently 'cleanup' the lone webapp directory. Best to unjar outside of the container webapp directory and copy the unjarred WAR into the webapp dir.
